# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lotka_volterra.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/lotka_volterra.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lotka_volterra.cir.res.gs ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/lotka_volterra.cir.res.gs ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lotka_volterra.cir.tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/lotka_volterra.cir.tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tranRc.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tranRc.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tranRc.cir.tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tranRc.cir.tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> lotka_volterra.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;bug1145son;ic;notmorethan4procs")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP lotka_volterra.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} lotka_volterra.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir.prn lotka_volterra.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED lotka_volterra.cir)
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> lotka_volterra.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;bug1145son;ic;notmorethan4procs")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP lotka_volterra.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} lotka_volterra.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir.prn lotka_volterra.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/lotka_volterra.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED lotka_volterra.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/tranRc.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> tranRc.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/tranRc.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;bug1145son;ic")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/tranRc.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP tranRc.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/tranRc.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} tranRc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/tranRc.cir.prn tranRc.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1145_SON/tranRc.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED tranRc.cir)
endif()
